Detector.Details: This detector checks for method calls that are not allowed for use.
This detector checks for correct CopyableBuilder definition.

BugPattern.LongDescription: {1} uses a method that is prohibited. The headers() and rawQueryParameters() methods create a deep copy of the data, which can result in significant memory pressure. Instead of retrieving a copy of the headers to look at it, use methods like hasHeaders(), firstMatchingHeader(...) or forEachHeader(..) which may be optimized in the type to avoid copying the data.
